## Checklist

### For Agent Changes

- [ ] Updated source prompt in `agents/[name]/[name].md`
- [ ] Updated `.claude/commands/` if applicable
- [ ] Updated `.claude/skills/` if applicable
- [ ] Updated `.cursor/rules/` if applicable
- [ ] Updated `claude-projects/` if applicable
- [ ] Updated `ai-rules/` if applicable
- [ ] Updated documentation if needed

### For New Agents

- [ ] Created `agents/[name]/[name].md`
- [ ] Created `agents/[name]/README.md`
- [ ] Created `.claude/commands/[name].md`
- [ ] Created `.claude/skills/[name]/SKILL.md`
- [ ] Created `.cursor/rules/[name].mdc`
- [ ] Created `claude-projects/[name]-instructions.md`
- [ ] Created `ai-rules/[name].txt`
- [ ] Updated main README.md

### Testing

- [ ] Tested with at least one integration method
- [ ] Verified output format is correct
- [ ] Checked for typos and formatting issues
